name: Uchi no Ki
description:
Energy. Life. Ki.

In Uchi no Ki, you play the role of an astral monk seeking truth. To find it, you'll need to traverse the underground, and utilize your Ki to solve any obstacles you encounter.

Strength of spirit, solid of mind.

Controls:

  • Movement - arrow keys | WASD
  • Jump - up key | W
  • Detach Ki - space
  • Esc to exit

Made solo for the GMTK Game Jam 2020, which had the theme "Joined Together".

Attribution: https://github.com/voithos/uchi-no-ki/blob/main/ATTRIBUTION.md

Thank you for playing! ❤️
